welcome.title: Test your knowledge on the generations of Formula E models.
welcome.subtitle: Take a quiz now for the chance to win exclusive prizes!

difficulty.title: Ready to test your knowledge?
difficulty.text1: Gear up to answer questions about the three Formula E racing cars.
difficulty.text2: Choose your difficulty below to begin:

congrats.title: Congratulations!
congrats.subtitle: Your score is:
congrats.text: Enter your information below to register for the prize draw:
congrats.terms: I confirm that I am over 18 years of age and accept the terms and conditions and the Saudia Airlines Privacy Policy.

leaderboard.title: Your score is:
leaderboard.tip: Tip: answer faster to score more points!
leaderboard.text: If you're among the finalists by the end of the contest, you will be notified via email about your prize.

name.required: You must enter your full name.
name.length: Full name must be at least 2 characters.
